data.oai_dc:dc: The database includes information about specimens of the Arachnida Collection of the Museum and Institute of Zoology Polish Academy of Sciences, Warszawa. There is the material of 8 families (Agelenidae, Amaurobiidae, Anyphaenidae, Corinnidae, Cybaeidae, Desidae, Dictynidae, Hahniidae) described by W. Kulczyński, J. Prószyński, W. Staręga. This historical collection comprises about 91,000 specimens (at present the database has 10098 records).|10,098 occurrences
